original_text: And he said, “Hear my words: If there is a prophet among you, I the Lord make myself known to him in a vision; I speak with him in a dream.
korean_text: 이르시되 내 말을 들으라 너희 중에 선지자가 있으면 나 여호와가 환상으로 나를 그에게 알리기도 하고 꿈으로 그와 말하기도 하거니와

sentences.original_text: If there is a prophet among you,
I the Lord make myself known to him in a vision;
sentences.korean_translation: 나 주는 그에게 이상으로 나를 나타내고

sentences.original_text: I speak with him in a dream.
